info.description: This is an API for searching addresses ("adresní místa") in the Czech registry RUIAN (Registry of Territorial Identification, Addresses and Real Estates).
info.title: RUIAN address search API

get.description:
By passing the admCode parameter, you can find addresses that have their code
starting with the parameter's value.

parameters.name: admCode
parameters.description: A number with which the address code could should begin with

200.description: Page containing addresses matching the criteria

400.description: Required String parameter 'admCode' is not present

get.description: Returns information for an address given it's unique identifier as a path parameter.

parameters.name: admCode
parameters.description: Address's unique identifier (*kód adresního místa*). A 9 digit integer.

parameters.name: houseNumber
parameters.description: Specify address's house number (*číslo domovní*), orientational number(*číslo orientační*) or both

200.description: Page of addresses matching the given query.

get.description: Given GPS coordinates of a point in decimal degrees, finds addresses within a radius defined by distance.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Distance in kilometers. Defines radius of the search.

200.description: Page of addresses within the given distance of the point.

get.description: Returns a list of city names that start with the given string parameter `city`.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: String with which the city name should begin with.

400.description: Required String parameter 'city' is not present

get.description: Returns a list of district names that start with the given string parameter `district`. If parameter `city` is defined, only the districts from that city are returned.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name used as a filter to suggest districts. Needs to be exact term. Case sensitive.

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: String with which the district name should begin with.

get.description: Returns a list of street names that start with the given string parameter `street`. If parameters `city` and `district` are defined, only the streets from that city and district are returned.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name used as a filter to suggest streets. Needs to be exact term. Case sensitive.

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: District name used as a filter to suggest streets. Needs to be exact term. Case sensitive.

parameters.name: street
parameters.description: String with which the street name should begin with.

get.description: Returns a list of house identifications (combination of house number, orientational number and orientational number letter) that start with the given string parameter `house number`. If parameters `city`, `district` or `street` are defined, only the house identifications from that city, district and street are returned.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name used as a filter to suggest house numbers. Needs to be exact term. Case sensitive.

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: District name used as a filter to suggest house numbers. Needs to be exact term. Case sensitive.

parameters.name: street
parameters.description: Street name used as a filter to suggest house numbers. Needs to be exact term. Case sensitive.

parameters.name: houseNumber
parameters.description: String with which the house/orientational number should begin with.
